ops_per_clock_notes.int8: 44 INT8 tiles x 512 ops + 7 Matrix tiles x 8192 ops = 22,528 + 57,344 = 79,872 INT8 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.bf16: 13 BF16 tiles x 512 ops + 7 Matrix tiles x 4096 ops = 6,656 + 28,672 = 35,328 BF16 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.int4: 44 INT8 tiles x 1024 ops + 7 Matrix tiles x 8192 ops = 45,056 + 57,344 = 102,400 INT4 ops/clock
ops_per_clock_notes.note: 64 heterogeneous tiles (44 INT8, 13 BF16, 7 Matrix). 8x8 checkerboard. 16nm TSMC.

theoretical_peaks_notes: Peaks @ 900 MHz (6W mode). INT8: 79,872 ops/clock x 900 MHz = 71.9 TOPS. BF16: 35,136 ops/clock x 900 MHz = 31.6 TFLOPS.
notes: Entry-level KPU for edge AI. 64 heterogeneous tiles (70/20/10 INT8/BF16/Matrix). 16nm TSMC. 16MB distributed L3. LPDDR5 64 GB/s. For drones, robots, edge devices. 60-70% efficiency factor.
